chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
S: Set
A: S -> Prop
Mult: S -> S -> S
Add: S -> S -> S
I: S
O: S
Opp: S -> S
v: S -> nat

Goal:
is_ring -> forall a b d : S, divide d a -> divide d b -> divide d (Add a b)

Premises:
divide = fun a b : S => A a /\ A b /\ (b = O \/ a <> O /\ (exists q : S, A q /\ b = Mult a q)) : S -> S -> Prop
is_ring = commutativity S Add /\ is_group S A Add O Opp /\ intern S A Mult /\ associativity S Mult /\ distributivity S Add Mult : Prop
VectorDef.rect2 : forall P : forall n : nat, VectorDef.t ?A n -> VectorDef.t ?B n -> Type, P 0 (VectorDef.nil ?A) (VectorDef.nil ?B) -> (forall (n : nat) (v1 : VectorDef.t ?A n) (v2 : VectorDef.t ?B n), P n v1 v2 -> forall (a : ?A) (b : ?B), P (Datatypes.S n) (VectorDef.cons ?A a n v1) (VectorDef.cons ?B b n v2)) -> forall (n : nat) (v1 : VectorDef.t ?A n) (v2 : VectorDef.t ?B n), P n v1 v2 where ?A : [S : Set A : S -> Prop Add : S -> S -> S Mult : S -> S -> S O : S I : S Opp : S -> S v : S -> nat |- Type] ?B : [S : Set A : S -> Prop Add : S -> S -> S Mult : S -> S ->...-> nat |- Type]
opp_opp : forall (S : Set) (G : S -> Prop) (Add : S -> S -> S) (O : S) (Opp : S -> S), is_group S G Add O Opp -> forall x : S, G x -> x = Opp (Opp x)
opp_unicity : forall (S : Set) (G : S -> Prop) (Add : S -> S -> S) (O : S) (Opp : S -> S), is_group S G Add O Opp -> forall x y : S, is_opposite S G Add O x y -> y = Opp x
VectorDef.fold_right2 : (?A -> ?B -> ?C -> ?C) -> ?C -> forall n : nat, VectorDef.t ?A n -> VectorDef.t ?B n -> ?C where ?A : [S : Set A : S -> Prop Add : S -> S -> S Mult : S -> S -> S O : S I : S Opp : S -> S v : S -> nat |- Type] ?B : [S : Set A : S -> Prop Add : S -> S -> S Mult : S -> S -> S O : S I : S Opp : S -> S v : S -> nat |- Type] ?C : [S : Set A : S -> Prop Add : S -> S -> S Mult : S -> S -> S O : S I : S Opp : S -> S v : S -> nat |- Type]
is_opposite : forall S : Set, (S -> Prop) -> (S -> S -> S) -> S -> S -> S -> Prop
regular_l : forall (S : Set) (G : S -> Prop) (Add : S -> S -> S) (O : S) (Opp : S -> S), is_group S G Add O Opp -> forall y z : S, G y -> G z -> forall x : S, G x -> Add x y = Add x z -> y = z
neutral : forall S : Set, (S -> Prop) -> (S -> S -> S) -> S -> Prop
distributivity : forall S : Set, (S -> S -> S) -> (S -> S -> S) -> Prop
opposite : forall S : Set, (S -> Prop) -> (S -> S -> S) -> S -> (S -> S) -> Prop
is_group : forall S : Set, (S -> Prop) -> (S -> S -> S) -> S -> (S -> S) -> Prop
associativity : forall S : Set, (S -> S -> S) -> Prop
commutativity : forall S : Set, (S -> S -> S) -> Prop
intern : forall S : Set, (S -> Prop) -> (S -> S -> S) -> Prop
div_O_O = fun H : is_ring => and_ind (fun (_ : commutativity S Add) (H1 : is_group S A Add O Opp /\ intern S A Mult /\ associativity S Mult /\ distributivity S Add Mult) => and_ind (fun (H2 : is_group S A Add O Opp) (_ : intern S A Mult /\ associativity S Mult /\ distributivity S Add Mult) => and_ind (fun (_ : intern S A Add) (H5 : associativity S Add /\ neutral S A Add O /\ opposite S A Add O Opp) => and_ind (fun (_ : associativity S Add) (H7 : neutral S A Add O /\ opposite S A Add O Opp) => and_ind (fun (H8 : neutral S A Add O) (_ : opposite S A Add O Opp) => and_ind (fun (H10 : A O) (_ : forall x : S, A x -> Add x O = x /\ Add O x = x) => conj H10 (conj H10 (or_introl eq_refl))) H8) H7) H5) H2) H1) H : is_ring...
List.nth_overflow : forall (A : Type) (l : list A) (n : nat) (d : A), length l <= n -> List.nth n l d = d
PeanoNat.Nat.div_lt : forall a b : nat, 0 < a -> 1 < b -> PeanoNat.Nat.div a b < a
PeanoNat.Nat.pow_div_l : forall a b c : nat, b <> 0 -> PeanoNat.Nat.modulo a b = 0 -> PeanoNat.Nat.pow (PeanoNat.Nat.div a b) c = PeanoNat.Nat.div (PeanoNat.Nat.pow a c) (PeanoNat.Nat.pow b c)
PeanoNat.Nat.div_exact : forall a b : nat, b <> 0 -> a = b * PeanoNat.Nat.div a b < -> PeanoNat.Nat.modulo a b = 0
PeanoNat.Nat.pow_neg_r : forall a b : nat, b < 0 -> PeanoNat.Nat.pow a b = 0
Nat.land = fun a b : nat => Nat.bitwise andb a a b : nat -> nat -> nat Arguments Nat.land (_ _)%nat_scope
Inductive nat : Set := O : nat | S : nat -> nat Arguments Datatypes.S _%nat_scope
Nat.lor = fun a b : nat => Nat.bitwise orb (Nat.max a b) a b : nat -> nat -> nat Arguments Nat.lor (_ _)%nat_scope
PeanoNat.Nat.bits_inj : forall a b : nat, PeanoNat.Nat.eqf (PeanoNat.Nat.testbit a) (PeanoNat.Nat.testbit b) -> a = b
is_unitary_commutative_ring = is_ring /\ commutativity S Mult /\ neutral S A Mult I : Prop
List.map_nth_error : forall (A B : Type) (f : A -> B) (n : nat) (l : list A) (d : A), List.nth_error l n = Some d -> List.nth_error (List.map f l) n = Some (f d)
Nat.ldiff = fun a b : nat => Nat.bitwise (fun b0 b' : bool => (b0 && negb b')%bool) a a b : nat -> nat -> nat Arguments Nat.ldiff (_ _)%nat_scope
PeanoNat.Nat.Bezout = fun n m p : nat => exists a b : nat, a * n = p + b * m : nat -> nat -> nat -> Prop Arguments PeanoNat.Nat.Bezout (_ _ _)%nat_scope
sumbool_ind : forall (A B : Prop) (P : {A} + {B} -> Prop), (forall a : A, P (left a)) -> (forall b : B, P (right b)) -> forall s : {A} + {B}, P s
mult_opp_opp : is_ring -> forall x y : S, A x -> A y -> Mult (Opp x) (Opp y) = Mult x y
mult_opp_l : is_ring -> forall x y : S, A x -> A y -> Mult (Opp x) y = Opp (Mult x y)
mult_opp_r : is_ring -> forall x y : S, A x -> A y -> Mult x (Opp y) = Opp (Mult x y)
Nat.gcd = fix gcd (a b : nat) {struct a} : nat := match a with | 0 => b | Datatypes.S a' => gcd (Nat.modulo b (Datatypes.S a')) (Datatypes.S a') end : nat -> nat -> nat Arguments Nat.gcd (_ _)%nat_scope
mult_O : is_ring -> forall x : S, A x -> Mult x O = O /\ Mult O x = O
Nat.bitwise = fix bitwise (op : bool -> bool -> bool) (n a b : nat) {struct n} : nat := match n with | 0 => 0 | Datatypes.S n' => (if op (Nat.odd a) (Nat.odd b) then 1 else 0) + 2 * bitwise op n' (Nat.div2 a) (Nat.div2 b) end : (bool -> bool -> bool) -> nat -> nat -> nat -> nat Arguments Nat.bitwise _%function_scope (_ _ _)%nat_scope
Ring_polynom.PEeval : forall R : Type, R -> R -> (R -> R -> R) -> (R -> R -> R) -> (R -> R -> R) -> (R -> R) -> forall C : Type, (C -> R) -> forall Cpow : Type, (BinNums.N -> Cpow) -> (R -> Cpow -> R) -> list R -> Ring_polynom.PExpr C -> R
Ring_polynom.interp_PElist : forall R : Type, R -> R -> (R -> R -> R) -> (R -> R -> R) -> (R -> R -> R) -> (R -> R) -> (R -> R -> Prop) -> forall C : Type, (C -> R) -> forall Cpow : Type, (BinNums.N -> Cpow) -> (R -> Cpow -> R) -> list R -> list (Ring_polynom.PExpr C * Ring_polynom.PExpr C) -> Prop
Ring_polynom.Pphi_dev : forall R : Type, R -> R -> (R -> R -> R) -> (R -> R -> R) -> (R -> R -> R) -> (R -> R) -> forall C : Type, C -> C -> (C -> C -> bool) -> (C -> R) -> (C -> option C) -> list R -> Ring_polynom.Pol C -> R
PeanoNat.Nat.lor_land_distr_r : forall a b c : nat, PeanoNat.Nat.lor a (PeanoNat.Nat.land b c) = PeanoNat.Nat.land (PeanoNat.Nat.lor a b) (PeanoNat.Nat.lor a c)
InitialRing.gen_phiZ : forall R : Type, R -> R -> (R -> R -> R) -> (R -> R -> R) -> (R -> R) -> BinNums.Z -> R
Ring_theory.pow_N : forall R : Type, R -> (R -> R -> R) -> R -> BinNums.N -> R

```coq
intros H a b d H1 H2. unfold divide in *. destruct H1 as [H1A [H1B H1C]]. destruct H2 as [H2A [H2B H2C]].
destruct H as [[H_comm [H_group [H_intern [H_assoc H_dist]]]]].
unfold divide. split.
- split; [|split].
  + apply H1A.
  + apply H2A.
  + right. split.
    * intros contra. apply H1B. rewrite contra, H3. apply H2B.
    * exists d. split.
      { apply H_comm. }
      { rewrite H1C, H2C. reflexivity. }
Qed.```

original: intros H a b d H1 H2. unfold divide in *. destruct H1 as [H1A [H1B H1C]]. destruct H2 as [H2A [H2B H2C]]. destruct H as [[H_comm [H_group [H_intern [H_assoc H_dist]]]]]. unfold divide. split. - split; [|split]. + apply H1A. + apply H2A. + right. split. * intros contra. apply H1B. rewrite contra, H3. apply H2B. * exists d. split. { apply H_comm. } { rewrite H1C, H2C. reflexivity. }
